name: Gigabyte M32U
description: 32-inch 4K gaming monitor with 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. Features SS IPS for wide viewing angles, HDMI 2.1 for console gaming, and KVM switch.

reviews.review_text: Best value 4K 144Hz monitor. Excellent for the price.
HDMI 2.1 makes this perfect for PS5 too.
IPS glow in corners but overall great.
